Package com.cafean.JobStatus.tree

Class ProjectTreeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel
      • com.cafean.JobStatus.tree.ProjectTreeModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionListener, javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener, javax.swing.tree.TreeModel
    public class ProjectTreeModel
extends javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel
implements javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionListener, javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener
    The data model for a @{link JobTable JobTable}. This model represents connections to servers in an internal tree structure mapped to an extended JTree. This data model is used to view and manipulate the servers it connects to and the data those servers contain.

    For example: A calculation server is represented by a root node which, when expanded, connects to the server it represents and retrieves all the root folders that reside on that server. Expanding those folders retrieves and shows sub-folders and runs.

    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectTreeModel

        public ProjectTreeModel​(java.util.List<PlatformDefinition> platformList,
                        ClientTrackerModuleLoader trackerModuleLoader,
                        boolean showJobs,
                        boolean allowFileImport,
                        Configurator prefs)
        Creates a new ProjectTreeModel instance.
        Parameters:
        platformList - a List containing the currently available PlatformDefinitions
        trackerModuleLoader - the ClientTrackerModuleLoader for loading tracker modules for the current client.
        showJobs - if true, jobs will be shown in the project tree.
        allowFileImport - this flag allows JobStatus to import completed runs.
        prefs - the Configurator for JobStatus.

    • Method Detail

      • setRoot

        public final void setRoot​(javax.swing.tree.TreeNode root)
        Overrides:
        setRoot in class javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel

      • setShowFoldersOnly

        public void setShowFoldersOnly​(boolean foldersOnly)
        Set to true if this tree model should show only folders. When this is true, the tree model will instruct server nodes to retrieve the entire recursive folder list from the selected server during expansion rather than relying on each folder node to do the retrieval.

      • isShowFoldersOnly

        public boolean isShowFoldersOnly()
        Returns true if this tree model is configured to show only folders. When this is true, the tree model will instruct server nodes to retrieve the entire recursive folder list from the selected server during expansion rather than relying on each folder node to do the retrieval.

      • getShowJobs

        public boolean getShowJobs()
        returns true if this data model should include nodes for jobs

        public boolean getAllowFileImport()
        returns true if this data model should include nodes for jobs

      • getRootNode

        public javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getRootNode()
        An extension of JTree's getRoot() that casts the node as a DefaultMutableTreeNode before returning it.
        Returns:
        A DefaultMutableTreeNode containing the root node.

      • close

        public void close()
        Takes the place of what would normally be done in finalize(). Moved here because of the large amount of data that could potentially be stored here and because Server interfaces must be explicitly destroyed. Note: Must be called to release the resources held by this model.

      • initializeTree

        public void initializeTree()
        Initialize the tree by adding the server nodes.

      • getPrefs

        public Configurator getPrefs()

      • treeExpanded

        public void treeExpanded​(javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionEvent event)
        If the expansion path ends with a Server Node, a connector is created to connect to that node's Server. When the interface is connected, the Server Node will be updated with root projects or facilities. If the connection fails, the node will die and it's display will be updated accordingly.
        Specified by:
        treeExpanded in interface javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionListener
        Parameters:
        event - the TreeExpansionEvent describing the expansion.

      • treeCollapsed

        public void treeCollapsed​(javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionEvent event)
        Specified by:
        treeCollapsed in interface javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionListener

      • valueChanged

        public void valueChanged​(javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionEvent event)
        Does nothing.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        event - the TreeSelectionEvent describing the selection.

      • localFoldersMissing

        public void localFoldersMissing​(CalcServerNode node)
        Notifies this tree model that the local calc server node has been connected and currently contains no root folders.
